DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration Performed Study Activity Standard Unit of Measure Quantity PCORnet CDM Dispense Amount Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._Regularly and widely used.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._Number of units (pills, tablets, vials) dispensed.

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.
